name: Arnew
text: 0 is both a number and the numerical digit used to represent that number in numerals.

name: Ativan
text: Ativan (lorazepam) is in a group of drugs called benzodiazepines

name: Benicar
text: Benicar (olmesartan) is an angiotensin II receptor antagonist.

name: Coumadin
text: Coumadin (warfarin) is an anticoagulant (blood thinner). Warfarin reduces the formation of blood clots.
